name: SUB A. R. E.
description:
Explore the deepest parts of the ocean, complete objectives and escape.

You are  thrown into the unknown region of the ocean. Where researchers found remains of ancient civilization. The only thing you have is scan of the region and approximate positions of ruins. Your objective is to scan them and escape. 

  • There are 8 artifacts.
  • You are alone on this mission.
  • Flora and fauna is unknown.
  • All of the instructions are available on the pinboard.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • LMB (hold) - interact
  • ESC - menu
